info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 2:53PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Boulder County through 345 PM MDT... At 253 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Eldorado Springs, or 20 miles northwest of Denver, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Arvada, western Westminster, Boulder, western Broomfield, Lafayette, Louisville, Erie, Superior, Eldorado Springs and Niwot. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
